Name: Symploke: Legend of Gustavo Bueno (Chapter 2)
About the game: Symploké: The Legend of Gustavo Bueno is a point and click adventure with the scent of legendary classics such as The Secret of Monkey Island or The Day of the Tentacle. The game is completely designed in MS Paint and it is divided in different chapters. This is Chapter 2. Did You Finish Chapter 1? To play Chapter 2 you must introduce the password given when you got through Chapter 1. If you haven’t, please download Chapter 1 for free and come back once you have completed it. Dismantling Corruption If you thought that your University was an example of freedom and independent thought, you were wrong! Discover what is happening behind the scenes and save students from an untrustworthy Rector Magnificus. Homage to Hegel The structure of each chapter of this game is set as in Hegel’s The Phenomenology of Spirit: every chapter is a step forward towards the path of the Spirit. This is Hegel’s main contribution to the world of gaming.
